org.apache.flink.python.api.streaming.data

类 PythonReceiver<OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.python.api.streaming.data.PythonReceiver<OUT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PythonReceiver<OUT>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to read data from memory-mapped files.

      • collectBuffer

        public void collectBuffer(Collector<OUT> c,
                          int bufferSize)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a buffer of the given size from the memory-mapped file, and collects all records contained. This method assumes that all values in the buffer are of the same type. This method does NOT take care of synchronization. The user must guarantee that the buffer was completely written before calling this method.
        参数:
        c - Collector to collect records
        bufferSize - size of the buffer
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createTuple

        public static Tuple createTuple(int size)
